mapping_scope.partial: Query covers the core assessment control but with different approach/scope
mapping_scope.combination: Multiple queries are combined to fully cover a single assessment control
mapping_scope.superset: Query covers everything the assessment control does plus covers additional risk
mapping_scope.exact: Query identifies the same assessment control with same scope
